content: b. The Vatican Document Gaudium et Spes describes Jesus Christ as the perfect man who restored humanity's dignity by restoring its image of God. This reflects the Christian belief that Jesus, as the Son of God, came to earth to save humanity from sin and restore the divine image in which humans were created. The document emphasizes the central role of Christ in the life of the Church and the importance of recognizing the dignity of all human beings as children of God.
